titleStmt.title: Proclamation adjourning the Parliament from the eighteenth day of August, to the fifteenth day of December, 1697.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twenty ninth day of July, and of Our Reign the ninth year, 1697.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
